mention.text: a joint regional air defense shield
part of the unified air defense system of the Commonwealth of Independent States -LRB- CIS -RRB-
Armenia , Azerbaijan , Belarus , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Moldova , Russia , Tajikistan and Uzbekistan
a commander appointed by the Kazakh and Russian presidents upon the recommendation of defense ministers from both sides
